m_descr: If pluged WiFi USB stick to Raspberry Pi you can set mode: access mode or client
l_clientMode_SSID: SSID of acces point to which you want to connect
l_clientMode_password: Password of acces point to which you want to connect
l_accessPointMode_SSID: SSID of your access point (Raspberry Pi)
l_accessPointMode_password: Password of your access point (Raspberry Pi)
